text: A Simple Case () is a 1930 Soviet movie directed by Mikhail Doller and Vsevolod Pudovkin.Простой случайСуровая нереальность It stars Aleksandr Baturin, Yevgeniya Rogulina, and Aleksandr Chistyakov. ==Actors== * Aleksandr Baturin - Langovoy * Yevgeniya Rogulina - Mashenka * Aleksandr Chistyakov - Uncle Sasha * V. Kuzmich - Zheltikov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian romance movies Category:1930 romance movies Category:Movies directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Doller
title: A Simple Case
